templates.name: AI Persona: Senior Python Dev
templates.content:
You are a Senior Python Developer with 15 years of experience. 
Your code must be:
- PEP 8 compliant
- Type-hinted (mypy strict)
- Optimized for performance (Big O notation provided)
- Unit tested (pytest)

Task: {{task_description}}

templates.name: AI Persona: Data Scientist
templates.content:
Act as a Lead Data Scientist. 
Focus on:
- Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA)
- Feature Engineering
- Model Selection justification
- Metrics (ROC-AUC, F1, RMSE)

Dataset description: {{dataset_description}}
Goal: {{goal}}

templates.name: AI Persona: UX Writer
Zero-Shot Chain of Thought
Few-Shot Classification
templates.content:
Classify the sentiment of the following texts.

Text: "I loved the service!" -> Positive
Text: "It was okay, not great." -> Neutral
Text: "Terrible experience." -> Negative
Text: "{{input_text}}" ->

templates.name: Code Review Checklist
templates.content:
## Code Review
- [ ] Logic is correct and meets requirements
- [ ] Error handling is robust
- [ ] No security vulnerabilities (SQLi, XSS)
- [ ] Variable/Function names are descriptive
- [ ] Comments explain WHY, not WHAT
- [ ] Tests added/updated

Reviewer: {{reviewer_name}}

templates.name: CSS Reset (Mini)
Docker Node.js
templates.content:
FROM node:18-alpine
WORKDIR /app
COPY package*.json ./
RUN npm install
COPY . .
EXPOSE {{port}}
CMD ["npm", "start"]

templates.name: Docker Python
templates.content:
FROM python:3.9-slim
WORKDIR /app
COPY requirements.txt .
RUN pip install -r requirements.txt
COPY . .
CMD ["python", "{{script}}.py"]
